content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0).

### Inserter and Chest System at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5), a wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5), and two other wooden chests at positions(x=44.5, y=-81.5) and (x=45.5, y=-80.5).

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Check if the entity's inventory is full before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when mining resources
- Ensure you have a sink entity in place to accept the output of the mining drill.
- Ensure the mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine resources.

### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure you have the required fuel and resources before attempting to use the furnace.
- Ensure the furnace is not already full before attempting to insert items.
